abstract: The bank backed away from an industry-owned registration system that oversees millions of home loans.
snippet: The bank backed away from an industry-owned registration system that oversees millions of home loans.
lead_paragraph: As the uproar over questionable conduct by mortgage lenders intensified Wednesday, one of the nation’s largest banks distanced itself from a controversial, industry-owned registration system that oversees millions of home loans.

headline.main: Chase Acts to Broaden Foreclosure Reviews
headline.print_headline: Chase Acts To Broaden Foreclosure Reviews

abstract: The foreclosure chaos, caused by disorganization and inexperienced employees, came as no surprise to insiders.
snippet: The foreclosure chaos, caused by disorganization and inexperienced employees, came as no surprise to insiders.
lead_paragraph: At JPMorgan Chase & Company, they were derided as “Burger King kids” — walk-in hires who were so inexperienced they barely knew what a mortgage was.

headline.main: Bankers Ignored Signs of Trouble on Foreclosures
headline.print_headline: Banks Ignored Signs of Trouble On Foreclosures

byline.original: By Eric Dash and Nelson D. Schwartz

abstract: Inexperienced employees and a lack of organization led to chaos in the foreclosure process at many lenders.
snippet: Inexperienced employees and a lack of organization led to chaos in the foreclosure process at many lenders.
lead_paragraph: At JPMorgan Chase, they were derided as “Burger King kids” — walk-in hires who were so inexperienced they barely knew what a mortgage was, Eric Dash and Nelson D. Schwartz write in The New York Times.

headline.main: Bankers Ignored Signs of Trouble on Foreclosures

abstract: JPMorgan Chase & Company backed away from an industry-owned registration system that oversees millions of home loans.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase & Company backed away from an industry-owned registration system that oversees millions of home loans.
lead_paragraph: As the uproar over questionable conduct by mortgage lenders intensified Wednesday, one of the nation’s largest banks distanced itself from a controversial, industry-owned registration system that oversees millions of home loans, Eric Dash writes in The New York Times.

headline.main: Chase Acts to Broaden Foreclosure Reviews

abstract: JPMorgan Chase slashed third-quarter compensation for its investment-bank employees by 31 percent from the prior quarter, as the company’s revenue declined, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase slashed third-quarter compensation for its investment-bank employees by 31 percent from the prior quarter, as the company’s revenue declined, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase slashed third-quarter compensation for its investment-bank employees by 31 percent from the prior quarter, as the company’s revenue declined, Bloomberg News reported.
